content: onto glass tree ornament ornament two string 18 green beads 1 white bead 1 green dagger bead 1 white bead * 37 green beads 1 white bead 1 green dagger bead 1 white bead * repeat this pattern till you have 16 dagger beads strung on thread then string 195 green beads on to thread chain 24 slip_stitch to form ring chain 1 round 1 32 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet of ring chain 1 round 2 chain 3 3 treble_crochet in same st holding the last lp of each st on hook 4 lps on hook yo draw through all 4 loops chain 5 slip_stitch into top of cluster picot made * chain 4 skip 1 single_crochet bsc in next single_crochet chain 4 skip 1 single_crochet 4 treble_crochet in next single_crochet holding the last lp of each st on hook 5 lps on hook yo draw through all 5 loops chain 5 slip_stitch into top of cluster * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into the top of the 1st cluster 8 clusters 2 round 3 slip_stitch into the chain 5 p chain 1 bsc in same lp 8 chain 10 bsc in next chain 5 p lp * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into 1st bsc of round round 4 slip_stitch into the chain 10 lp chain 1 bsc in same lp chain 3 bsc in same lp 3 times * chain 3 bsc in next chain 10 lp chain 3 bsc in same lp 3 times * repeat from * to * around ending with chain 1 double_crochet in to 1st bsc of round chain 1 round 5-8 bsc in same space as joining * chain 3 bsc in next chain 3 lp 8 repeat from * to * around ending with chain 1 double_crochet in to 1st bsc of round chain 1 round 9 chain 3 3 treble_crochet in same st holding the last lp of each st on hook 4 lps on hook yo draw through all 4 loops chain 4 bsc in 2nd chain from hook bringing 18 seed beads 1 white seed bead 1 dagger bead 1 white seed bead 18 seed beads up behind st before finishing be sure to draw your stitch up tight before finishing for best effects chain 3 slip_stitch into top of cluster chain 4 bsc in next chain 3 lp chain 4 * 4 treble_crochet in next single_crochet holding the last lp of each st on hook 5 lps on hook yo draw through all 5 loops chain 4 bsc in 2nd chain from hook bringing 18 seed beads 1 white seed bead 1 dagger bead 1 white seed bead 18 seed beads up behind st before finishing chain 3 slip_stitch into top of cluster chain 4 bsc in next chain 3 lp chain 4 * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch into the top of the 1st cluster end off weave end in 16
